[Sharp Fangs](/Feats.aspx?ID=1055) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

---

Your teeth are formidable weapons. You gain a fangs unarmed attack that deals 1d8 piercing damage.

<title level="2">Sharp Fangs leads to...</title>
[Envenom Fangs](/Feats.aspx?ID=1057)
name: Sharp Fangs
